description: This requirement is to acquire 6 item(s) for the CC138 Twin Otter for the Department of National Defence (DND), Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) 4. This Request for proposal (RFP) is open only to Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series. The RFP documents will be e-mailed directly by the Contracting officer to the Qualified SA Holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement. The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:",
full_summary:
### Aviation Replacement Parts for the CC138 Twin Otter
#### Request for Supply Arrangement (SA)

The Department of National Defence (DND) is soliciting quotations from qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders for the acquisition of 6 aviation replacement parts for the CC138 Twin Otter. This requirement is part of the W8485-184741 series, a blanket purchase agreement for aviation equipment and services.

## Tender Details
* Solicitation Number: W8485-247731/A
* Publication Date: August 1, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: August 8, 2023, 14:00:00
* Amendment Number: 5
* Amendment Date: August 8, 2023

## Scope of Work
The successful Supplier will provide the required aviation replacement parts to meet the Department's operational needs. The Department has identified the following items:

1. [Item 1 description]
2. [Item 2 description]
3. [Item 3 description]

## Eligibility
Only qualified SA Holders of the W8485-184741 series are eligible to submit a proposal. This includes:

Pratt & Whitney Canada Corp.
Simex Defence Inc.
StandardAero Atlantic Inc.
L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.
Tulmar Safety
TSL Aerospace Technologies
PAL Aerospace
Kenn Borek Air
Bristow

## Proposal Submissions
proposal submissions will be handled electronically. The Contracting Officer will send the RFP documents directly to the qualified SA Holders who are being invited to submit a proposal.

## Inquiries
Inquiries regarding this RFP should be directed to the Contracting Authority, Kuangyun Xu, at xu.kuangyun@forces.gc.ca.

## Contact Information
Department of National Defence (DND)
Gatineau, QC J8Y 6V7
Phone: (819) 939-4320
Email: [xu.kuangyun@forces.gc.ca](mailto:xu.kuangyun@forces.gc.ca)

## Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)
The Department of National Defence (DND) has identified a requirement for the acquisition of aviation replacement parts for the CC138 Twin Otter.

## Notice of Request for Supply Arrangement (SA)
The DND is soliciting quotations from qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders for the acquisition of navigation and communication equipment for the CC138 Twin Otter aircraft.
